= Available corpora =

Corpora are represented in different formats. RDF is default format. Corpora are stored in a triple store with different context.
SPARQL endpoint: [http://example.org/mutation-db]

  # Enzyminer corpus
    * RDF: [http://example.org/enzyminer-corpus.rdf]
    * CSV: [http://example.org/enzyminer-corpus.csv]
    * Context: [http://example.org/mutation-db/enzyminer-corpus.rdf]
  # Haloalkane dehalogenase corpus (Dhla corpus)
    * RDF: [http://example.org/dhla-corpus.rdf]
    * CSV: [http://example.org/dhla-corpus.csv]
    * Context: [http://example.org/mutation-db/dhla-corpus.rdf]
